sys_email_canned_message.body:
Dear ${contact_detail_spoc_disclosing_country}
Please be aware that we have received notification of a cross border engagement involving the following Covered Recipient(s) from your affiliate:

  • ${name_of_cr}


As the CoE cross border team is not yet able to verify the consent status of this/these CR(s) in Global Xpend, we suggest that you ensure that this/these CR(s) exist in your local system and that consent for disclosure is requested.
Please remember that consent management is the responsibility of your affiliate. In case you have any questions, please refer to our Q&A or contact us by replying to this email.
Â 

Sincerely,

Your Global Xpend CoE Cross-Border Team
sys_email_canned_message.title: Consent Email
